1.author: TrumpsFlaccidCock
1.body:
"but anytime I see a video of some fat slimy dude with no life just bothering the police I also want to pull out my taser and tell that dude to get lost."

Explain to me how, in this situation that you typed out with your fingers, you are justified to pull out your taser and use it to intimidate someone. Please.

1.author: no4scinjewboi
1.body:
Oh my god I already fucking did. I’m not retyping the same thing over and over again bc you can’t read. Idk why you’re trying to pick a fight but stfu. You’re literally just mad I said I don’t like cops, but you know just as well as I do that it’s justifiable to draw a non lethal weapon, like a taser to intimidate someone into leaving you alone after they have continuously stalked/harassed you. 

Stop trying to pick fights on Reddit and accuse people of shit they never said. Don’t make me have to justify myself, or clarify what I did and did not say. All I said is that auditors, or anyone who abuses the right to take photos in public is scummy. To the point that I don’t feel bad when they harass police officers and get a taser pulled on them. It’s stalking and harassment, and in a situation where you feel threatened because someone won’t leave you alone, you have the right to defend yourself. And drawing a non-lethal weapon to intimidate someone into leaving you alone is well within anyone’s right. Never said I wanted to shoot him, or fantasized about hurting him, all I said was if I was a cop being harassed in that way I’d draw my taser and tell them to fuck off too, because YOU HAVE THE LEGAL RIGHT AND ITS NOT LIKE IM MAKING UP SADISTIC FANTASIES IN MY HEAD JFC

1.author: TrumpsFlaccidCock
1.body:
Not once in any of your posts did you justify actually doing what you fantasized about, now you're all worked up because someone asked you to explain yourself. 

I'm not mad you don't like cops, I fucking hate cops, one reason being is the misuse of the weaponry they carry, including tasers. So for you to say you dislike cops, but would behave as one of the worst ones would because someone is...talking at you? is disgusting. 

Have your meltdown but here's some advice, make sure you can back up the words you type at even the slightest scrutiny.

1.author: no4scinjewboi
1.body:
What do you want me to justify? I’ve said the same thing over and over again. You have a legal right to defend yourself. The use of a non lethal weapon like a taser to intimidate someone from continuously stocking and harassing you is your right! That’s the law. I’m not fantasizing about anything and I’m annoyed that you’re being so accusatory. Nothing I said was misuse.

Never said I would use it on someone who is “just talking” to me. I used auditors as a specific example because they shove cameras in cop’s faces while they’re on duty and follow them around, bugging them until the cop finally snaps and gets assertive and then the guy videoing has his clickbait. I specifically used that example because I was referring to specifically people who stalk and harass by abusing the right to photograph in public like auditors/paparazzi. Not just people speaking to the police. I never said that, I never fantasized about it and I don’t appreciate you accusing me of that. Look through all my comments, I repeatedly was only referring to using a taser on someone who is actually stalking/harassing you, because that’s when you have the legal right to defend yourself. I don’t appreciate randoms on the internet calling me crazed

4.author: chickencheesebagel
4.body: Call someone stupid repeatedly and then get upset when someone points it out.  What a gigantic piss baby you are.

4.author: totallynotstefan
4.body: I'm not upset, and you know I'm right.

4.author: chickencheesebagel
4.body: Better training would probably help, yes.  But even if everything you said is put in place, cops would still kill people.  Like I said, they're human.  Bad shit is going to happen in life.  The hope is that the right outcome occurs when bad shit happens.  These cops are being charged with murder.  This is the correct outcome.  And you're calling me stupid for saying that murder charges are appropriate here.  Completely reddited.

4.author: totallynotstefan
4.body:
>But even if everything you said is put in place, cops would still kill people.

This is not a zero sum game.  This is not all or nothing.  You can't just throw your hands up and say 'if we can't solve the problem completely without exception, we shouldn't even try'.

We've been barely trying for decades, and it's no surprise barely anything has changed.  

> These cops are being charged with murder. This is the correct outcome.

Agreed, but this is the exception, not the rule. 

And as I said in my first post, these protests are not a response to the arrests, they are a response to the video.  

You cannot just erase decades of persistent abuse by getting it right one time.  

>And you're calling me stupid for saying that murder charges are appropriate here.

Nope, I'm calling you stupid because you've said demonstrably stupid things.  For reference, check your most downvoted posts in this thread should you need evidence.  Perhaps this will emerge as a teachable moment for you.

4.author: chickencheesebagel
4.body: Do you think I give a fuck about the opinions of redditors?

lmao

America's problem is that it uses the word "Police" to describe a government funded gang. Abolishment of the police is not what you think you want, it is anarchy. What you want is an actual police force to remove the gang that's currently taking it's spot + name.

8.author: orangepinkman
8.body:
I love when people are too dumb to understand a concept and instead tell me "you don't want this you want *THIS*." Keep telling me what I want instead of attempting to understand what it actually means. It makes you look super intelligent...

People like you are why we are in the situation we are in in this country lol. 

It reminds me of this guy I used to work with. He would fight me tooth and nail on changing any little thing because "this is how it's always been done we can't do it a different way! This way works!" and I'd finally convince him to let me change it and a week later he would be bragging to everyone about how he increased efficiency by changing this thing... This is how ridiculous you people are. You don't want change because you can't see how that change would be beneficial. All you can do is see what currently exists and cry that without it things wouldn't work. You have no vision.

Muslim isn't a race.  I never said anything bigoted.  Try again.

Are you denying that the people who did 911 were Muslim?  Because they were.  And their religious beleifs were the main reason for doing what they did.

I don't need it more simple.  I need it more relevant and less strawman.  Let's see if you can do that first and we'll go from there.

10.author: englishcrumpit
10.body:
There are 60 fucking sources on that wiki page. You think im gonna look at them all? Link the relevant ones dumbass. Do you want me to go find your souces? That isnt how this works. Stop being lazy. I hope you didnt do this in school. 

Then what are you even talking about? I say pakistan didnt do 9/11. Then you say Osama was in pakistan. Did you just want to let me know where he was? 

The commenter said "Pak governments protection." This is what im refuting. You havent provided any evidence to the contrary. But decided to pipe up about it. For what reason?

You also dont know about cultural Muslims. People from islamic countries who aren't practicing Muslims consider themselves culturally muslim. You can be racist towards people that you perceive as muslim and treat them unfairly as a result. You SHOULD know this. Its worrying that you dont.  

The main comment is a racist trope. When muslims are mentioned, shit like that appears every single time. This was a few people burning a flag. One of the flag isnt even the right one. And a redditor felt the need to mention 9/11. Like thats somehow the relevant at all. Its "oh! muslims are mentioned time to call them terrorists."

10.author: hyperboleistheworst
10.body:
>There are 60 fucking sources on that wiki page. You think im gonna look at them all?

No.  But if you're just going to claim they don't exist then you're obviously a liar.

>Link the relevant ones dumbass

They're all relevant, dumbass.

>Do you want me to go find your souces?

No.  I want you to stop claiming there is no evidence when there is mountains of evidence at your fingertips.

>That isnt how this works. Stop being lazy. I hope you didnt do this in school.

Nah, this is exactly how this works.  You claimed there was zero evidence.  I gave you a convient link to all the evidence one could ever hope for.

>I say pakistan didnt do 9/11.

No.  You claimed there was no evidence that bin laden was found in pakistan.

>Did you just want to let me know where he was? 

Well, yea.  You claimed there was no evidence he was hiding in Pakistan.

>The commenter said "Pak governments protection

They also said bin laden was found in pakistan in the same sentence.  You replied "there is no evidence of this".  I provided evidence that bin laden was in fact hiding in Pakistan.

>But decided to pipe up about it. For what reason?

Because bin laden was hiding in Pakistan and you claimed there was no evidence.

>You also dont know about cultural Muslims. People from islamic countries who aren't practicing Muslims consider themselves culturally muslim. You can be racist towards people that you perceive as muslim and treat them unfairly as a result. You SHOULD know this. Its worrying that you dont. 

Muslim culture also isn't a race.  If I've said something bigoted you'll have to point it out for me.  Otherwise, save your outrage because idgaf.

>The main comment is a racist trope. When muslims are mentioned, shit like that appears every single time. This was a few people burning a flag. One of the flag isnt even the right one. And a redditor felt the need to mention 9/11. Like thats somehow the relevant at all. Its "oh! muslims are mentioned time to call them terrorists."

Then go bitch at the person who said it.  Their comment has nothing to do with anything I've said.

10.author: englishcrumpit
10.body:
"Then go bitch at the person who said it. Their comment has nothing to do with anything I've said."

Then quit replying to me. You replied to me and didn't expect me to reply? 

​

But apart from you miss understanding what I was replying to. That's okay its hard sometimes. I was talking about the Pakistan government colluding with bin laden. Not if he was physically there or not. 

You NEED to learn how to reference correctly. When using a source. You link the direct source for that statement. You dont say. The source is somewhere on this page. They aren't all relevant. When writing a scientific paper. You dont say. Here is a reference please look at their references. You ALWAYS go right to the source. That IS lazy. wiki is a fine resource to use. can be a little bias sometimes but generally is alright.

10.author: hyperboleistheworst
10.body:
>Then quit replying to me. You replied to me and didn't expect me to reply? 

Are you really that dense?  Just fuck right off.  You made a specific claim.  I provided evidence that contradicts your claim.

> I was talking about the Pakistan government colluding with bin laden. Not if he was physically there or not. 

Then you should have been more specific.  The only claim I ever made was that bin laden was in fact hiding in Pakistan.  That didn't stop you from strawmaning me several times.

>You NEED to learn how to reference correctly. When using a source. You link the direct source for that statement

Neat.  You need to learn to read for yourself instead of expecting to be spoonfed.

You see all those blue links in the article? Yea, those are direct references to then sources that are relevant.  Really isnt that hard to figure out.

>They aren't all relevant.

They literally are all relevant.  That's why they're listed as sources.  Irrelevant sources won't be listed there.

>When writing a scientific paper. You dont say. Here is a reference please look at their references

I'm not writing a paper.  I'm arguing with an ignorant dipshit who expects to be spoonfed.

>That IS lazy.

And you claiming there is no evidence isn't lazy?  Like I said. Fuck right off, clown.
